metadata.title: USN-6507-1 -- GlusterFS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GlusterFS incorrectly handled certain memory operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause GlusterFS to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6507-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  glusterfs-client - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libgfxdr0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libgfapi0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libgfrpc0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 glusterfs-common - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libglusterfs-dev - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libglusterfs0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libglusterd0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 libgfchangelog0 - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 glusterfs-server - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 glusterfs-cli - 10.1-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
